Class ScoreRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • ScoreRow
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FixedAmountRow, NumberRow, SumAllRow
    public abstract class ScoreRow
extends java.lang.Object
    ScoreRow represents one scoring row of the ScoreSheet.

    "Twos", "Full House", and "Yahtzee" are examples of these scoring rows.

    See Also:
    ScoreSheet, SumAllRow, FixedAmountRow, NumberRow, NumOfAKindRow, FullHouseRow, StraightRow, ChanceRow

        Getter for the row's score. NOTE: The score might be Yahtzee.UNSET.
        Returns:
        Score of the row.

        Print the toString() to System.out.

      • calculateScore

        public abstract void calculateScore​(Dice dice)
        Calculates and sets the score of the row for the given dice.
        Parameters:
        dice - The dice that is getting scored.

      • isValid

        public abstract boolean isValid​(Dice dice)
        Checks the validity of the given dice for the scoring row.
        Parameters:
        dice - The dice that is getting verified.
        Returns:
        Whether the dice is valid for this scoring row.
